subject: Restructuring sensor fusion folder structure
commitMessage:
Restructuring sensor fusion folder structure

	- Changing structure to support new virtual sensors
	- adding folder for reference and design documents
	- adding folder for results
	- renaming folders

signed-off-by: Ramasamy <ram.kannan@samsung.com>
Change-Id: Iea7dd562c15f88003996512eefe47932a7efcd63

subject: Sensor Fusion Orientation Estimation update
commitMessage:
Sensor Fusion Orientation Estimation update

Updated the following changes from the initial version submitted
  - Kalman Updates based on noise covariance from aiding and driving system
  - Added better time update transformation matrix
  - Added support for Bias estimation and updation
  - Cleanup

signed-off-by: Ramasamy <ram.kannan@samsung.com>
Change-Id: I69b930d6c15649857d9a5fd9aa23e48fd0e486d4

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

This is first version of the working sensor fusion code.
Uploaded patch set 2.

The '\r' return characters are due to octave code editing and executing in windows environment. The first version is a basic working version, all features of sensor fusion will be consolidated as development progresses.

subject: sensor-framework - add support for systemd
commitMessage:
sensor-framework - add support for systemd

The following changes have been implemenetd:
  1. socket activation by systemd
  2. the service has been updated to send startup statu to systemd
     (by calling sd_notify())

Conflicts:

	packaging/sensor-framework.spec

Change-Id: I4e86baa23f09cf17329c06728ce46b9ef1739ecb
Signed-off-by: Jacek Pielaszkiewicz <j.pielaszkie@samsung.com>
Signed-off-by: Łukasz Stelmach <l.stelmach@samsung.com>

 standard       i586           succeeded
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2

looks fine now
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2: Code-Review-1

This patch seems to target the incorrect package/branch. See my comments in TZSP-5314

Patch Set 2:

Copying my JIRA comments here for ease of access:

There seem to be a number of issues which need to be clarified on this bug and patch.

Patch: https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/11331/2
The gerrit submission linked above targets the tizen.org "tizen" branch. That branch is only used to build our 3.0 images AFAIK. I believe (Praj please correct me if wrong) this patch should be against the tizen_2.1_mobile branch in TZ.otcshare.org.

Second, the JIRA here mentions the 2.0 build of the PR3 image, but targets the 2.1 Project. Is the bug is reproducible on 2.1, 2.2, just 2.0?
Patch Set 2: Verified+1 Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

Patch Set 2:

If the corresponding filter is not in 3.0, it is an issue for tizen 3.0 as well.
